p: Equal amounts of cell supernatant, 10X supernatant, permeate, ZIKV stock, mock or rZNS1-His (250â€¯ng) were spotted onto a Polyvinylidene Difluoride (PVDF) membrane (Hybond-P, GE Healthcare) with a Bio-Dot microfiltration device (Bio-Rad). Immunoblotting was performed as described in 2.6. Western blotting using 1:1000 ZNS1 mouse polyclonal sera or 1:200 human sera.
